Subject: Maxwell VW Page 
Date: Thu, 16 Jul 2020 01:48:57 +0000 
Should we be updating to the page to reflect yesterday's hearing and order? Let me know if this works: 
July 14, 2019 
update: 
On July 14, 2019, the initial conference, arraignment, and bail hearing were held in the case of United States v. 
Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (MN). The defendant entered a plea of not guilty to the Superseding Indictment. The 
court announced its ruling that the defendant will be incarcerated pending trial. The Court scheduled discovery and 
motion deadlines for counsel as well as trial date for July 12, 2021, before the Honorable Alison J. Nathan, United 
States District Judge for the Southern District of New York, Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse, 4o Foley 
Square, New York, New York, in Courtroom 906. 
Sent from my iPad 
EFTA00028774
